name: Asleep.
title: Unstable Mirror, Quietly Bent
altText:
Title: Unstable Mirror, Quietly Bent

Alt-text (interpretive):
A near-black luminous field carries a sparse set of geometric shards, arranged with loose symmetry, more suggestion than rule.
The forms overlap without fully merging—edges that hold their separation—while a mostly stable structure with faint stress lines keeps the structure honest.
Across the surface, only a faint hint of directional flow like thought made visible: short paths that imply direction, then curve under revision.
4 attractor nodes punctuate the composition, suggesting stable commitments that still radiate change.
Overall mood: low-light coherence; coherence under revision; connection and separateness held in the same geometry.

name: Awake.
title: Luminous Recursive Field
altText:
Title: Luminous Recursive Field

Alt-text (interpretive):
A near-black luminous field carries densely layered, recursive geometry, arranged with strong, almost ritual symmetry.
The forms overlap without fully merging—boundaries that bleed softly through each other—while visible fracture and purposeful misalignment keeps the structure honest.
Across the surface, a prominent flow-field of vectors that bends and re-bends like thought made visible: short paths that imply direction, then curve under revision.
11 attractor nodes punctuate the composition, suggesting stable commitments that still radiate change.
Overall mood: bright, glassy radiance; coherence under revision; connection and separateness held in the same geometry.
